title: I keep remembering Ita (TEFC)
brief_description: A videotape and study guide about the positive role of older people in the community. It presents three distinct personal portraits of older women and three different approaches to growing older. Each portrait shows older people taking charge of their lives. The women portrayed have a positive attitude to themselves and their community. Study guide available.
